messages.title: POPULAR LOCAL COUNCILLOR STANDING TO BE READING WEST MP
messages.content: On 12th December we have a chance to elect Rachel Eden to be our MP. Rachel understands the issues that matter to local residents because she has been active in our community for over a decade. She will be a fantastic MP for Reading West.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Labour Government will give you the final say on Brexit and deliver a new referendum.
Under the Tories, the NHS and Social Care are in crisis. Labour will invest an extra £30bn in our NHS by 2024.
Labour will improve standards, security, and affordability for renters and end ‘no fault’ evictions.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In 2017 we came within 2,876 votes of winning Reading West. THE LIBDEMS AND GREENS CAN'T WIN HERE. YOUR VOTE WILL MATTER ON THURSDAY 12TH DECEMBER.

issues.brexitEurope: A Labour Government will give you the final say on Brexit and deliver a new referendum.
issues.health: Under the Tories, the NHS and Social Care are in crisis. Labour will invest an extra £30bn in our NHS by 2024.

housing.content: Labour will improve standards, security, and affordability for renters and end ‘no fault’ evictions.

leaflet.personalStatement: Rachel understands the issues that matter to local residents because she has been active in our community for over a decade.
